issue.title: Add option to pass cmake arguments via environment variable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-306](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-306). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add an alternative way to pass extra cmake arguments via an environment variable as in some situations it is hard to pass these arguments to the build_ext step.
